text: Artūras Rimkevičius (14 April 1983 – 23 September 2019) was a Lithuanian footballer. He played as a striker. He was born in Kaunas. Rimkevičius played for FK Tauras Tauragė,Ivartis.lt | Artūras Rimkevičius karjerą tęs Tauragėje FBK Kaunas, FK Liepājas Metalurgs, FK Silute, FK Šiauliai, FK Bekentas,FBK Kaunas – Eufo.de Atlantis FC.Vuosi 2009 and Asteras Tripoli F.C..www.delfi.lt | „Vėtros“ puolėjas A.Rimkevičius pasirašė sutartį su Graikijos klubu He made his international debut against Latvia in June 2010, scoring three times for his country in seven caps, one against Estonia and two against Armenia. Rimkevičius shot himself at his Kaunas apartment on 23 September 2019, aged 36.Tragiška žinia: rastas negyvas buvęs Lietuvos rinktinės puolėjas ir A lygos rekordininkas ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Lithuanian sportspeople Category:Suicides by firearm Category:European footballers Category:People from Kaunas
title: Artūras Rimkevičius
